模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.hero

类 Hero

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.GameObject
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.MovableObject
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.hero.Hero
public class Hero extends MovableObject
A Hero is a main.GameObject that is controllable by the player. Of all the main.GameObject, only Hero has KeyBindings. Hero can shoot HeroProjectiles, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruits for points. Hero has three lives. And changing into enduring state after losing a life. Game over once lose three lives.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Hero

      public Hero​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      Initialize the hero.
      参数:
      world - InteractableWorld type, the instance of InteractableWorld.
      colNum - int type, the horizontal position of hero.
      rowNum - int type, the vertical position of hero.

  • 方法详细资料

    • drawOn

      public void drawOn​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphicsContext)
      Draw the hero on the canvas. Different image for different direction. Golden surrounding bubble circle in shielding state. Red surrounding bubble circle in enduring state. Black surrounding bubble circle in stunned state.
      指定者:
      drawOn 在类中 GameObject
      参数:
      graphicsContext - GraphicsContext type, draw calls to a Canvas using a buffer.

    • shootProjectile

      public void shootProjectile()
      Hero can shoot projectile. Once shoot, add it to the InteractableWorld.

    • collideWithEnemy

      public void collideWithEnemy() throws IOException
      If the hero collide with Enemy in not shileding state or enduring state, then lose one life can back to the birth place. In short enduring state after rebirth.
      抛出:
      IOException - If the target fxml in die function does not exist, then throw exception.

    • jump

      private void jump()
      Hero can jump if on the floor.

    • pressed

      public void pressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode)
      This method bids different actions with the pressing keyboard input.
      参数:
      keyCode - KeyCode type, character code for the value of the key triggered by the pressing on keyboard.

    • released

      public void released​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode)
      This method bids different actions with the releasing keyboard input.
      参数:
      keyCode - KeyCode type, character code for the value of the key triggered by the releasing on keyboard.

    • collideWithWall

      public void collideWithWall()
      Set the horizontal velocity of hero to zero if collides with wall.
      指定者:
      collideWithWall 在类中 MovableObject

    • die

      public void die() throws IOException
      Hero dies then returns the game over interface.
      抛出:
      IOException - If the target fxml does not exist, then throw exception.

    • collideWithProjectile

      public void collideWithProjectile() throws IOException
      Lose one life when collide with the projectile of boss if not in shielding or enduring state; Return to the birthplace in enduring state if lose a life; If lose all lives then die.
      抛出:
      IOException - If the target fxml does not exist, then throw exception.

    • update

      public void update()
      Update the position and state of hero.
      覆盖:
      update 在类中 MovableObject

    • collideWithFloor

      public void collideWithFloor()
      Hero lands on the floor and makes sound.
      指定者:
      collideWithFloor 在类中 MovableObject

    • collideWithCeiling

      public void collideWithCeiling()
      Set horizontal velocity to zero when collide with the ceiling;
      指定者:
      collideWithCeiling 在类中 MovableObject

    • getShielding

      public boolean getShielding()
      Determine if it is a state of shielding.
      返回:
      boolean type, true for shielding, false for unshielding.

    • isDeath

      public boolean isDeath()
      Determine if it is a state of death.
      返回:
      boolean type, true for death, false for survival.
